title: Tough Sunrises
content:
ent +1

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Sent by Lathander, the god of creativity and sunrises. Unfortunately, it was not received by the cleric who needed it at that crucial moment, but by a baffled librarian in Daggerford. who used it as a door stopper.

Tough Sunrises is one of the Morningstar Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Tough Sunrises is an enchanted morningstar that can deal radiant damage in an
